    c_str(str) click to toggle source 
    # File ext/etc/mkconstants.rb, line 15
def c_str(str)
  '"' + str.gsub(C_ESC_PAT) {|s| C_ESC[s]} + '"'
end
    each_const() { |name, default_value| ... } click to toggle source 
    # File ext/etc/mkconstants.rb, line 56
def each_const
  DEFS.each {|name, default_value|
    yield name, default_value
  }
end
    each_name(pat) { |name| ... } click to toggle source 
    # File ext/etc/mkconstants.rb, line 62
def each_name(pat)
  DEFS.each {|name, default_value|
    next if pat !~ name
    yield name
  }
end
